greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of labeled cyclic subgroups of order k in the alternating group A_n, 1 <= k <= A051593(n).
program: G(n)={my(s=0); forpart(p=n, if(sum(i=1,#p,p[i]-1)%2==0, my(d=lcm(Vec(p))); s+=x^d*permcount(p)/eulerphi(d))); s}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jul 03 2018
